column1: #text=It was the summertime and my hair was getting quite long , as it was down to nearly my bellybutton .
#text=As a result , I decided it was time for a haircut .
#text=After flipping through numerous options , I decided to get a bob hair cut to my chin .
#text=This was a drastic change , yet I knew I was ready for it .
#text=I left the house and took the drive over to the salon .
#text=My favorite hairstylist Michelle eagerly greeted me with an excited smile . ''
#text=Michelle led me over to a sink as she washed my hair with sweet smelling shampoo .
#text=After towel-drying my hair quickly , she led me over to her salon chair .
#text=She took out her scissors and started cutting .
#text=I looked down at the floor at all the hair that flying all over the place .
#text=I started to get nervous , wondering if I made a mistake .
#text=By the time she was done cutting and blew dry my hair , I looked back in the mirror .
